Manx: O Ayr yn toilshey, voyd’s ta çheet dagh gioot
English: O Father of light, from you comes every gift
Diplomatic: O Ayr yn toilshey, voyd’s ta çheet dagh gioot

Manx: Gow ass my chree dagh aggle as dagh dooyt hene
English: Take each fear and every single doubt out of my heart
Diplomatic: Gow ass my chree dagh aggle as dagh dooyt hene

Manx: Cur dou yn credjue ta çheet neose voyd
English: Give me the faith that comes down from you
Diplomatic: Cur dou yn credjue ta çheet neose voyd

Manx: As brish ny geulaghyn dy pheccah jee’m
English: And break the chains of sin off me
Diplomatic: As brish ny geulaghyn dy pheccah jee’m
